dmca.title: Copyright Infringement of My website
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Managing Editors [mailto:4men.org@gmail.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, July 05, 2005 3:13 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Copyright Infringement of My website

Mr. George Poletes:
Being the "Designated Agent" for Theplanet.com hosting services, I am hereby
placing you on notice of a serious copyright infringement which has taken
place by health4man.org, a website hosted by theplanet.com

My website, http://www.4-men.org has copied in almost its entirety by the
individual listed below.
"A physical or electronic signature of a person ("Complaining Party")
authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is
claimed to be infringed;"
Ronald A. Williams

"Identification of the copyrighted work claimed to have been infringed, or
if multiple copyrighted works at a single online site are covered by a
single notification, a representative list of such works at that site; "
http://www.4-men.org is the copied site including numerous articles
verbatum.

"Identification of the material that is claimed to be infringing or to be
the subject of infringing activity and that is to be removed or access to
which is to be disabled, and information reasonably sufficient to permit the
service provider to locate the material; "
Look at his home page health4man.org, read the verbiage and follow the
articles links.  Word for word ... he's stolen my intellectual content.

"Information reasonably sufficient to permit the service provider to contact
the Complaining Party, such as an address, telephone number, and, if
available, an electronic mail address at which the complaining party may be
contacted; "
You may contact me at 4men.org@gmail.com

"A statement that the Complaining Party has a good faith belief that use of
the material in the manner complained of is not authorized by the copyright
owner, its agent, or the law; and A statement that the information in the
notification is accurate, and under penalty of perjury, that the Complaining
Party is authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that
is allegedly infringed. "

I hereby state under penalty of perjury I am the rightful owner of the
property copied.  health4man.org has not asked for, nor requested permission
to utilize our content.  I am the sole owner of the content used at
4-men.org

Sincerely,
Ronald Williams
http://www.4-men.org

The web owner info is as follows:

Last Updated On:16-Apr-2005 02:02:10 UTC Expiration Date:15-Apr-2006
17:25:04 UTC Sponsoring Registrar:Alldomains.com (R17-LROR) Status:OK
